thread.title: 10 of the most 'Instagrammed' places in the US you need to visit — PHOTOS
thread.title_full: 10 of the most 'Instagrammed' places in the US you need to visit — PHOTOS | Las Vegas Review-Journal

author: Kristen DeSilva
title: 10 of the most 'Instagrammed' places in the US you need to visit — PHOTOS
text:
Roads, waves, mountains and landmarks. Since the advent of Instagram, travelers have been sharing photos and inspiring exploration. Some places have been photographed more than others around the United States, and because of Instagram, it's easier to see the favorites.
Bus-ticket site Busbud analyzed photographs taken all over the country to determine the most popular places in each state on the photo-sharing social media platform.
Of course, the Strip is the most "Instagrammed" place in Nevada, according to Busbud . But what about the others? California's could also have been predicted — Disneyland, as well as Lousiana — Bourbon Street in New Orleans.
Others are landmarks, historic sights, bodies of water, hikes and parks. Keep scrolling for the 10 of the most Instagrammed places in the U.S. you should plan your next trip around and check out the other 40 by clicking here .
